metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6274 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[S3 and Glacier remotes creds embedded in the git repo were not encrypted]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

git-annex - 5.20140919
No subscription required

criterions.comment: git-annex package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.20140919').
